data.text: @klgandhoda @JennaBushHager @hodakotb Absolutely - because beauty is always in the eye of the beholder. And to me- my daughter and granddaughters are always beautiful. 💕

@klgandhoda @JennaBushHager @hodakotb Everyone likes a compliment. As long as appearance isn’t all you focus on. You should build your child up in all aspects of their life. And... please please make Jenna the permanent co host with Hoda.
@klgandhoda @JennaBushHager @hodakotb I see nothing wrong with telling my child she's pretty. Plus she's more beautiful inside.
@klgandhoda @JennaBushHager @hodakotb Be in the moment. If they are doing something cute tell them they are cute if they are doing something smart tell them they are smart ...
@klgandhoda @JennaBushHager @hodakotb Jenna is so refreshing.  I love to watch her.
@klgandhoda @JennaBushHager @hodakotb U and Jenna make quite a pair @hodakotb
@klgandhoda @JennaBushHager @hodakotb Of course you should tell your daughter and your son that they are good looking.  This is a stupid discussion

@klgandhoda @JennaBushHager @hodakotb We love seeing the topic of #TrueBeauty discussed here. May we all raise, know, and be beautiful women on the inside and out. In her book #TheOtherSideOfBeauty, @leahdarrow expounds on this, looking at some of the world’s most beautiful people like #MotherTeresa.
@klgandhoda @JennaBushHager @hodakotb Too much over analyzing, compliment what you want to, all compliments make a persons day.

@klgandhoda @JennaBushHager @hodakotb Recently rewatched The Help and I was reminded of one of my favorite scenes during this segment.  “You is smart, you is kind, you is important.” ❤️   https://t.co/gkbu3EhUQZ
@klgandhoda @JennaBushHager @hodakotb Yes it's ok to tell your child she's beautiful, but that shouldn't be her only compliment, she's also smart, brave, funny and good.
@klgandhoda @JennaBushHager @hodakotb I have a brand new granddaughter and I tell her she’s beautiful all the time. There is nothing wrong with knowing you’re  beautiful.
@klgandhoda @JennaBushHager @hodakotb Of course u should plus tell her shes smart shes brave etc
